text: Greg Scott (born 21 June 1991) is a rugby league footballer who most recently played for the Swinton Lions in the Kingstone Press Championship. He plays on the wing. Scott came through the Widnes Vikings Academy. Scott has previously played for Swinton, Widnes and the Dewsbury Rams. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:Swinton Lions players Category:Widnes Vikings players Category:Dewsbury Rams players Category:Rugby league wingers
title: Greg Scott (rugby league)
